content: how often does nightly Rust update its cargo component? doing rustup update nightly appears to give me a rustc from 2022-02-22 as expected, but a cargo from 2022-02-15
is there a submodule in some repo that has to be manually bumped?

bstrie said:

is there a submodule in some repo that has to be manually bumped?

Yes. The update literally just got merged 10 min ago: #94277
Yes, the cargo submodule in the Rust repository
^^ the update mentioned by bjorn3 will be in tomorrows nightly
thanks, I suppose I should have guessed :P I'm eager to start trying out artifact dependencies
